Metadata: The Texas A&M AgriLife biofloc systems
Aquaculture America 2014 meeting, PowerPoint Presentation, Seattle, Washington, Feb. 9-12, 2014

This presentation, made at the Aquaculture America 2014 meeting Feb. 9-12, 2014, in Seattle, Wash., shows equipment and specifications used in the Texas A&M AgriLife Extension Service biofloc system for shrimp aquaculture, including ponds, tanks and greenhouses, with special attention to recirculation, feeding, monitoring, safety, drainage and electrical systems. Also included is a section on ammonia production by shrimp and ammonia removal in aquaculture, and water quality issues.
